mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO annotation(annotation_id, question_title, question_id, annotation_word, annotation_title, content, html, part_id, group_id, classroom_id, user_id, user_name, subject_id, subject_name, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES
(#{item.annotationId}, #{item.questionTitle}, #{item.questionId}, #{item.annotationWord}, #{item.annotationTitle}, #{item.content}, #{item.html}, #{item.partId}, #{item.groupId}, #{item.classroomId}, #{item.userId}, #{item.userName}, #{item.subjectId}, #{item.subjectName}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.createUser}, #{item.updateUser})
